reviews.sentence: Great hotel great location. Just stayed here on a business trip for five days. Nothing but good things to say. Staff was very friendly and helpful at all times Maid service was top notch Bed was comfortable nice large refridgerator in room room was clean Club Lounge amenities and the included breakfast was top notch and a short walk to a very cool part of town. Shops restaurants etc. I look forward to staying here again.

Outstanding level of service. When it comes to hospitality Pasadena Sheraton nails it. The hotel presentation is immaculate and so classy. The crew is very attentive and makes your accommodations spectacular. It is a very central location for Pasadena LA. 15 minutes from downtown and 5 minutes from Pasadena shopping strip on Colorado. This is definitely where you want to stay when you visit.

great location needs update. really liked this hotel. service was good. accommodations were clean but in need of some serious updating. the rooms smelled old. some of the rooms had patios which were nice but in need of some landscaping attention. lots of great restaurants and a mall just a few minutes away. we had breakfast buffet in hotel which was pretty below avg. prices were high.

Exceptional Customer Service. Located near downtown Pasadena. Easy walk to Pasadena shopping and dining. This is an older hotel with a few wear and tear issues but certainly functional. I attended an evening reception followed by a full day business meeting. The staff was accommodating. Extra kudos to the front desk staff.
Exceptional. FRIENDLY COURTEOUS STAFF. PET FRIENDLY FACILITY. GOOD RESTAURANTS.

Business trip to beutiful Pasadena. The hotel is very nice and the staff make you feel very welcome. There was a Halloween pumpkin carving context in the lobby that hotel staff were completing in and guests voted on their favorite pumpkin. That was fun. Also many of the staff were dressed in Halloween costumes. Captain America was my favorite. The Club lounge is very nice.

Classic Comfy Clean Holiday Vacay. This place is amazing. From their super accommodating warm and genuine staff to their super clean and comfy rooms I am very satisfied with our stay. Restaurant bar on premises with pool gym as well. Kid friendly and room service was great and prompt even on Christmas.

Great location. I have stayed at this hotel a few times for conventions and it is literally a 30 second walk to the convention center. The beds are comfy room is a good size and it comes with a fridge which is a plus for storing food on extended business trips. The gym looks like it is got an update and impressed me with the variety of equipment. I had definitely stay here again.

Great location the room was very clean. Great location room was smaller than expected. and the walls are paper thin. However the staff was very courteous and the hotel and amenities were extremely clean. I would Definitely stay here again.
Great accommodations especially the club.

Location is great. Couple of restaurants within walking distance. It is right behind the Pasadena Conference Center which is where I needed to be. One and only issue was the air conditioning unit is awfully loud at night. could not really get a great nights rest since if it was not on the room would get pretty hot. As for the service I did not need much but the housekeeping staff seemed friendly enough. They greeted us with smiles said hello and all that. I was on the second floor which had access to the gym and pool although I did not use those facilities. Not sure if it is just Pasadena in general but the town seemed a little empty so the hotel was not very packed. Overall the stay was acceptable for just one night but I do not think I would be able to stay here for much longer than that.

Attended an all day conference. Meeting room was in the basement and somewhat dank and warm Elevators were extremely slow. No wifi provided for participants hotel is just cheap. No cell service in the basement. May be a good hotel but would not recommend for meetings.

Really hard to judge a hotel of extremes. The Sheraton Pasadena is a hotel of opposite extremes. The photos online make it look a lot nicer than it actually is. Upon arrival you realize it is pretty old and in the middle of construction which gets in your way as you enter and leave. The front desk is very friendly and checks you in quickly. The rooms are nice but the hallways are kept very dark like a scene from a horror movie. I assume it is to be energy efficient which I can get behind but it is kind of weird. I would stay here if I am expecting just a place to crash but not a place I had consider a resort of somewhere I had hang out at.

Pleasant. The hotel has a very good location and the staff is very helpful. Parking is convenient. However this is an old hotel with the aging revealed in the rooms including a sagging mattress and elevators. The hotel has an outdoor pool but not a spa and the fitness room is small. An unpleasant smell came from underneath the elevators. The hotel has apparently started renovating its rooms but needs more upgrading work.

Wonderful. 新，干净整洁。位置很棒，泳池很可爱。穿过酒店大厅的后门就是主街道步行可到餐饮圈、市政厅、公园、教堂。The location is great and pool is lovely. Through the back door of the lobby is the main street you can walk to the mall old town hall central park church北面有机器轰鸣，南面就安静多了。there is a machine roaring by north of the hotel and the south is much quieter.
Great hotel and location. But only one elevator worked and was slow.

Clean safe friendly and great location. The location was superb. In a safe area and right across the street from an entertainment center with restaurants movie theater and antique mall. The hotel is only a short walk to historic City Hall. The hotel was very clean parking was good and the staff were very accommodating. I liked everything.

The elevator can and WILL take up to 7 minutes to arrive at the second floor. This has happened multiple times. If the elevator arrives and is not full you may get to enjoy the wonderously turbulent ride which starts and ends with a sudden jolt. The staircase behind the elevator is very dirty and leads directly outside but I had recommend it over the elevator. Especially if you get motion sick or lose your balance easily. When you finally get to your expensive room you will notice that they are not all the same size. We needed two rooms and got one that was 4 feet wider than the other which was somewhat nice for rolaway bed we needed. The walls are pretty thin so earplugs are necessary for light sleepers such as myself. On the plus side the rooms are fairly bright at night so you will not need to bring a nightlight. If you want to put icing on the cake Or salt in the wound. we did not have any towels in our room when we got here or a microwave. I would put this hotel on par with motel 6.

YOUR GOING TO WANT TO READ THIS FOLKS. The staff are 10 stars especially concierge and valet hands down. Elevator maintenance guys I encountered who were working on them are miserable and give attitude to family guest when asked friendly questions. They might want to hire another company for that. They are doing a horrible job considering the elevator takes forever and took me to another floor before taking me to the one I pressed the button for. Bad vibes from the elevator guys Also see Sam Cooks review below from 3 weeks ago Kwanacks review from 2 months ago and Kaye Shaos review from 6 months might be more all related to elevator. Even those who maintain the elevators of all things should be in sync with such a wonderful staff and experience this Sheraton provides. Bad vibes make everything unsafe.

Nice short stay hotel. When visiting my son at Cal Tech I generally chose a Mariot Brand ya one of those guys who has drank the entire pitcher of Mariot Rewards Kol Aid. This first time guest at this Sheraton was pleasantly surprised to the point where I ’d place it a noticeable step above the Pasadena Courtyard despite being rated one step below as category 4. Staff are shockingly accommodating – I asked for and actually received an upgrade to a “ bi level ” room. If you do n’t mind the 7 steps the bi level room while similar in square footage to a standard room has what must be 14 ’ ceilings making the room feel much more spacious. All of these rooms are apparently on the first floor –. my room ’s sliding glass door led to a huge maybe 18’x18 ’. private courtyard. While the courtyard was nice there were only two low quality plastic chairs … note to staff …. the space is in need and has potential to be upgraded. The bathrooms were updated with vessel sinks and bathtubs have been removed and replaced with super showers …. a very nice add. Only gripe. the vessel sinks are so large that they eliminate anywhere to place your toiletries … recomend that the hotel install some shelves that would really make a difference. Finally reward members have access to a lounge that serves a very substantial free breakfast. This was a delighter. Highly recommend this property.
